pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers must wear: long-sleeved shirt and long pants, shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Keep out of reach of children. CAUTION! CAUSES MODERATE EYE IRRITATION. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Avoid breathing vapor or spray mist.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses if present after the first 5 minutes then continue rinsing eye. Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment. You may also contact 1-800-334-7577, collect day or night, for emergency medical treatment information. This product is identified as Roundup PROMAX® Herbicide, EPA Registration No. 524-579.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
